file_content.text: Looking good there, Jedi. Glad you could check in.
Looking good. Glad you could check in.
We're getting ready to ship out of Anchorhead--see if we can pick up any signals from the old Czerka base.
In the meantime, we've got a new lead. Kamus hit the jackpot in those files you lifted from the Gamorreans.
Something about the research facility?
Czerka information?
Oh?
Come on, Fauler. This is just another waste of time.
Somehow, I'm not excited.
Another? And here I thought we'd been making good progress.
One of the files was a personnel listing. It named everyone who worked at Czerka's Tatooine facility!
Most of the employees are long gone, but one stayed on-planet after the Czerka base was abandoned.
If we can find him, he might be able to tell us where the facility was, what the device is....
Maybe we could make Leksende back off!
Probably not--but sure.
His name is Grommik Kurthson. For a while, he was something of a drifter--finally bought a little moisture farm.
If he was here before Czerka abandoned the base, he must be ancient.
How old is he?
I'm guessing he's... sixties? Seventies? The files don't say.
You think he'll cooperate with us?
Will he help?
Hard to say. He was a security officer back in the day, but that doesn't tell us much.
He won't put up much of a fight.
Easy pickings.
Ah--right. Good reason not to fight him, then.
My big worry is that Leksende and his enforcement squad will get to Grommik first--try to keep him quiet.
Czerka's not hurting anyone else.
Then we have to protect him.
Age comes with wisdom; he may be able to handle himself.
Don't underestimate the old.
Or he could be half-senile. I wouldn't count on anything.
I'll make sure the asset is protected.
Understood.
I'm learning to trust your word.
That's alright. I know how to be fast and discreet.
Stealth is key, then.
You're assuming Grommik knows something.
If he's even a threat.
Sure am. Don't know if that's optimism or desperation.
Hardly a danger to me.
By the time you're through investigating Grommik, we'll be set up at our new forward base.
We, uh... we will?
From there, we can scout for the Czerka facility itself. Soon as you find anything, come out and meet us.
